subject: Sports Injuries
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi’s club, Barcelona, and his national team, Argentina, want him back as he recovers from an injury, but he should not let eagerness push him too far, too soon.
snippet: Lionel Messi’s club, Barcelona, and his national team, Argentina, want him back as he recovers from an injury, but he should not let eagerness push him too far, too soon.
